targets.query: SELECT host, jcore_log as "JCoreLog" ,"message" as "Alert", "ts_occurred" as "Occurred" FROM "monitoring"."helix_jcore_messages" WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT count("message") FROM "monitoring"."helix_jcore_messages" WHERE ("env" =~ /^$env$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h), "jcore_log"

SELECT "task_id", "wrk_proc_min", "wrk_wait_min" FROM "monitoring"."helix_n2p_workers" WHERE ("env" =~ /^$env$/ AND "worker_type" = 'AGG') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "env", "host", "rule_name", "state", "worker_type"

SELECT "task_id", "wrk_proc_min", "wrk_wait_min" FROM "monitoring"."helix_n2p_workers" WHERE ("env" =~ /^$env$/ AND "worker_type" = 'AGG') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "env", "host", "rule_name", "state", "worker_type"

SELECT "task_id", "wrk_proc_min", "wrk_wait_min" FROM "monitoring"."helix_n2p_workers" WHERE ("env" =~ /^$env$/ AND "worker_type" = '') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "env", "host", "rule_name", "state", "worker_type"
SELECT count(core_size) AS "Cores#" FROM "monitoring"."helix_cores_status" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h)

SELECT "heap_size" AS "heap_size_mb", "heap_used" AS "heap_used_mb", "heap_used" AS "heap_used_mb" FROM "monitoring"."wls_heap_status" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "wl_server", "state"  ORDER by time DESC

list.definition: show tag values from wls_heap_status with key = "env"
list.label: Env
list.name: env
list.query: show tag values from wls_heap_status with key = "env"

list.definition: show tag values from wls_heap_status with key = "wl_server" where env =~ /$env/
list.label: WL Server
list.name: wls
list.query: show tag values from wls_heap_status with key = "wl_server" where env =~ /$env/

list.definition: show tag values from helix_n2p_workers with key = "rule_name" where env =~/$env/
list.label: Rule Name
list.name: n2p_rule
list.query: show tag values from helix_n2p_workers with key = "rule_name" where env =~/$env/

list.definition: show tag values from helix_n2_status with key = "n2_process" where env =~ /$env/
list.label: N2 Process
list.name: n2_process
list.query: show tag values from helix_n2_status with key = "n2_process" where env =~ /$env/

list.definition: show tag values from helix_n2_status with key = "state" where env =~ /$env/ and n2_process =~ /$n2_process/
list.label: N2 State
list.name: n2_state
list.query: show tag values from helix_n2_status with key = "state" where env =~ /$env/ and n2_process =~ /$n2_process/

list.definition: show tag values from helix_jcore_messages with key = "jcore_log" where env =~ /$env/
list.label: Jcore Logs
list.name: jcoreLogs
list.query: show tag values from helix_jcore_messages with key = "jcore_log" where env =~ /$env/
